explanation: [0-0] A man in a purple T-shirt and jeans stands inside a hole with brick walls on both sides. He wears a blue baseball cap and looks up. In the lower right corner, there is a purple circle with yellow subtitles that read "S M O L".

[0-8] A green energy bar appears above the man in purple, showing full energy. He then takes out a sledgehammer from behind him and starts swinging it downwards. A pink wall is built under his feet as he swings the hammer, and fragments of bricks splash around. At the same time, the energy bar above the man's head decreases, turning from green to yellow and then to red, before disappearing completely. The man in purple puts down the hammer and looks up to the right. Green grass and trees appear above the brick wall, where a man in a blue jacket can be seen standing on the left and a woman in a red dress on the right.
